item.title: 中国在香港发行人民币债券，收益率创数年新低
item.description: 中国在香港发行的人民币计价主权债券收益率创十余年来新低，这表明市场对人民币债券的需求增强，并为北京扩大人民币国际化进程提供了支持。【原文：China sold yuan-denominated sovereign bonds in Hong Kong at the lowest yields in more than a decade, signaling stronger demand for its debt and offering support to Beijing’s push to expand its currency’s global use.】

item.title: Patria为拉美交易筹备新私募信贷基金
item.description: 据彭博新闻获得的声明显示，另类资产管理公司Patria Investments Ltd正筹备一只专注拉丁美洲的新私募信贷基金，此举旨在进一步扩大该公司在该地区的业务版图。【原文：Alternative asset manager Patria Investments Ltd is preparing a new Latin America-focused private credit fund in the latest bid to expand the market’s footprint in the region, according to a statement seen by Bloomberg News.】

item.title: 印尼全球最大镍矿被勒令减产
item.description: 印尼全球最大镍矿产量将大幅削减，当局正加大力度提振全球镍价。【原文：The world’s biggest nickel mine in Indonesia is to have its output slashed, as authorities step up efforts to boost global prices.】

item.title: 蒙特帕斯基银行董事迪斯特凡诺因涉案辞职
item.description: 西恩纳蒙特帕斯基银行董事会成员斯特凡诺·迪·斯特凡诺即将离职，此前有报道称他因涉嫌内幕交易正接受调查，该交易与该行去年收购梅迪奥银行有关。【原文：Banca Monte dei Paschi di Siena SpA board member Stefano Di Stefano is leaving the bank shortly after a news report that he’s under investigation for alleged insider trading linked to Monte Paschi’s takeover of Mediobanca SpA last year.】

item.title: 据称Goldi Solar正考虑在印度进行3.5亿美元的首次公开募股
item.description: 据知情人士透露，Goldi Solar Pvt.正考虑进行首次公开募股，预计融资规模最高可达3.5亿美元，这可能为印度可再生能源企业上市热潮再添新动力。【原文：Goldi Solar Pvt. is weighing an initial public offering that could raise as much as $350 million, according to people familiar with the matter, potentially adding to a revival in listings among India’s renewable-energy companies.】

item.title: 巴拉特房屋销售量因抵押贷款条件改善而上升
item.description: 英国最大住宅开发商巴拉特·雷德罗公司表示，随着"抵押贷款环境波动性降低"推动销售增长，该公司对房地产市场持乐观态度。【原文：Britain’s biggest homebuilder Barratt Redrow Plc says it sees reason for optimism in the housing market after a “less volatile mortgage lending environment” boosted sales.】

item.title: 比特币跌破6.7万美元，加密货币与股市走势分化
item.description: 比特币跌至上周五抛售以来的最低点，与攀升至新高纪录的亚洲股市形成鲜明反差，凸显出投资者对持续复苏缺乏信心。【原文：Bitcoin fell to its lowest level since last Friday’s selloff, diverging sharply from Asian equities that climbed to fresh records and highlighting investors’ lack of confidence in a sustained recovery.】

item.title: 富时100指数有望上涨，英镑走强
特朗普再次宣称美国关税终结印巴冲突
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德·特朗普重申，去年印巴冲突期间，他通过威胁加征关税并施压两国结束冲突，成功阻止了两国之间可能爆发的核战争。【原文：US President Donald Trump reiterated that he prevented a potential nuclear war between India and Pakistan during their conflict last year by threatening tariffs and pressuring both nations to end their clash.】

item.title: 印度顶级珠宝商称黄金价格波动抑制了买家增长
item.description: 印度顶级珠宝制造商泰坦公司表示，创纪录的高金价正抑制全球第二大黄金市场的需求，消费者正变得谨慎。【原文：Titan Co., India’s top jewelry maker, sees shoppers turning cautious as record-high gold prices weighed on demand in the world’s second-largest bullion market.】

item.title: 据称，欣杜贾集团正寻求以2亿美元出售阿肖克·莱兰旗下的OHM Mobility业务单元。
item.description: 据知情人士透露，阿肖克·莱兰有限公司正考虑为其电动出行服务部门筹集约2亿美元资金。【原文：Ashok Leyland Ltd. is considering raising about $200 million for its electric mobility services unit, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 依视路陆逊梯卡业绩下滑，给Meta眼镜制造商带来盈利压力
item.description: 依视路集团股价下跌，令这家雷朋眼镜制造商周三即将公布的财报备受关注，市场担忧利润率压力可能削弱智能眼镜带来的增长势头。【原文：A slide in EssilorLuxottica SA shares has raised the stakes ahead of Wednesday’s results from the Ray-Ban maker, signaling concern that margin pressures may blur a growth story amplified by smart glasses.】

item.title: 西门子能源在电力热潮中斩获创纪录燃气轮机订单
item.description: 西门子能源公司有望实现连续第二年营收增长，持续飙升的电力需求持续推动其燃气轮机和电网产品的销售。【原文：Siemens Energy AG is on track for another year of rising revenue as surging electricity demand continues to bolster sales of its gas turbines and power-grid products.】

item.title: 中国最大芯片制造商警告：仓促扩建的人工智能产能恐将闲置
item.description: 中国最大芯片制造商警告称，人工智能芯片的超额支出正将未来数年的需求提前释放，这使得部分数据中心面临闲置风险。【原文：China’s top chipmaker has warned that breakaway spending on artificial intelligence chips is bringing forward years of future demand, raising the risk that some data centers could sit idle.】

item.title: 人工智能概念股黯然失色，硬件企业盈利激增
item.description: 今年欧洲软件公司的盈利增长将低于硬件同行，加剧了全球市场对人工智能将重塑软件公司商业模式的担忧。【原文：Europe’s software companies are set for slower earnings growth than their hardware counterparts this year, compounding fears in global markets that artificial intelligence will reshape software firms’ business models.】

item.title: 波兰债务激增迫使图斯克搁置央行行长调查
item.description: 据知情人士透露，波兰政府已悄然放弃对央行行长亚当·格拉平斯基提起诉讼的计划，因担心法律纠纷可能动摇外国投资者的信心。【原文：The Polish government has quietly abandoned plans to put central bank governor Adam Glapinski on trial due to concerns that a legal battle could unsettle foreign investors, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 菲律宾比索升至10月以来最高水平，股市上涨吸引资金流入
item.description: 菲律宾比索汇率攀升至近四个月高位，主要得益于资金流入以及市场预期央行即将结束宽松周期。【原文：The Philippine peso climbed to its strongest almost four months on stock inflows and rising expectations the central bank is close to the end of its easing cycle.】

item.title: 战时在俄罗斯当银行家的体验
item.description:
奥地利瑞福森银行的俄罗斯分支机构盈利丰厚，却无法将资金汇出该国。

【原文：

The Russian unit of Austria’s Raiffeisen is immensely profitable, but it can’t get the money out of the country.

】

item.title: 波兰万亿经济体在德国展现实力
item.description:
来自东欧地区经济强国的企业正越来越多地在其邻国进行并购活动。

【原文：

Companies from Eastern Europe’s regional powerhouse are making more and more acquisitions next door.

】

item.title: 西塔拉石油计划在巴基斯坦首次公开募股，为扩张筹集资金
item.description: 巴基斯坦加油站运营商兼运输商西塔拉石油服务有限公司计划下月进行首次公开募股，以扩大其销售网点、车队规模及储存能力。【原文：Pakistan fuel station operator and transporter Sitara Petroleum Services Ltd. is planning an initial public offering next month to expand its outlets, fleet and storage capacity.】

item.title: 电力工程公司Solv Energy首次公开募股筹集5.125亿美元
item.description: 索尔维能源公司通过在美国首次公开募股筹集了5.125亿美元，其股票定价处于市场预估区间的最高点。【原文：Solv Energy Inc. raised $512.5 million in a US initial public offering, pricing its shares at the top of the marketed range.】

item.title: 美元在非农就业数据公布前走弱，交易员权衡降息风险
item.description: 美元兑所有主要货币汇率均出现下跌，因美国经济再度显现疲软迹象，投资者纷纷加码押注美联储将降息。【原文：The dollar dropped against all of its major peers as investors ramped up bets on Federal Reserve interest-rate cuts following fresh signs of weakness in the US economy.】

item.title: 印度城市化进程为房地产IPO创纪录之年奠定基础
item.description: 印度房地产开发商正转向资本市场融资，这表明他们对数百万人口向城市迁移将确保强劲需求的信心。【原文：India’s real estate developers are turning to capital markets to raise funds, signaling their confidence that the shift of millions of people toward cities will ensure robust demand.】

item.title: 中国股票获益于MSCI指数近三年来最大规模增持
item.description: 中国股票在MSCI核心指数中的净增持规模创近三年新高，为指数跟踪型投资者的资金流入奠定更强劲基础。【原文：Chinese shares have secured their biggest wave of net additions to MSCI Inc.’s key gauges in almost three years, setting the stage for stronger inflows from index-tracking investors.】

item.title: 中国餐饮连锁店在农历新年假期前关闭门店，股价暴跌
item.description: 中国一家高端上海菜连锁餐厅突然关闭了上海的10家分店，成为国内消费低迷的最新牺牲品，并在农历新年假期前夕引发食客的强烈抗议。【原文：One of China’s premium Shanghainese dining chains abruptly shut 10 outlets in the city, becoming the latest casualty of the country’s consumption slump and sparking an outcry from diners just days before the Lunar New Year holidays.】

item.title: 白宫修订美印贸易事实清单，删除"豆类"条目
item.description: 白宫修订了美印贸易协定事实清单，删除了关于豆类的表述，并修改了数字服务相关条款的措辞。【原文：The White House revised its factsheet on the US-India trade agreement by removing a reference to pulses and changing language around digital services.】

item.title: DQ及必胜客中国业务所有者拟以5亿美元出售
item.description: 知情人士透露，方源资本正考虑出售其在中国的必胜客和德芙连锁经营权。【原文：FountainVest Partners is considering selling the franchise operator of Papa John’s and Dairy Queen in China, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 澳大利亚指控另外两名中国人干涉外国事务
item.description: 澳大利亚当局指控另外两名中国公民涉嫌代表北京政府收集某佛教协会的信息，此案可能加剧两国关系紧张的风险。【原文：Australian authorities charged a further two Chinese citizens with allegedly collecting information about a Buddhist association on behalf of the government in Beijing, in a case that raises the risk of renewed tensions between the countries.】

item.title: 人工智能与美元走软推动新兴市场股市创历史新高
item.description: 新兴市场股票攀升至历史新高，亚洲科技股的强劲表现推动了这一涨势，市场对人工智能的乐观情绪以及美元走软共同助推了股价上涨。【原文：Emerging-market stocks climbed to a fresh record high, propelled by Asian technology shares on optimism over artificial intelligence and as the dollar weakened.】

item.title: 镍价延续涨势，印尼重申大幅削减采矿配额
item.description: 镍价连续第四日上涨，此前最大供应国印尼重申今年将大幅削减产量。【原文：Nickel extended gains for a fourth day after top supplier Indonesia reaffirmed it’ll sharply cut output this year.】
